data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Gamba have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
In the minute 1, Genta Miura (Gamba) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sapporo.
Throw-in for Sapporo in their own half.
In the minute 3, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Gamba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Sapporo.
In the minute 6, Throw-in for Sapporo at Sapporo.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards Gamba a goal kick.
Can Gamba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sapporo's half?
In the minute 8, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a Sapporo throw-in in Gamba's half.
Free kick Sapporo.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a throw-in for Gamba, close to Sapporo's area.
In the minute 11, Sapporo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gamba's Kosuke Onose has run offside.
Free kick for Sapporo in the half of Gamba.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Sapporo in the half of Gamba.
In Sapporo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball goes out of play for a Sapporo goal kick.
In the minute 20, Corner awarded to Sapporo.
Throw-in high up the field for Sapporo in Sapporo.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Gamba in their own half.
In the minute 22, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Sapporo.
Free kick for Gamba in their own half.
Sapporo drive upfield and Akito Fukumori gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Gamba defender.
In the minute 25, Free kick for Gamba in the half of Sapporo.
Gamba are coming forward and Kosuke Onose gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Sapporo at Sapporo.
In the minute 29, Gamba have a goal kick.
Gamba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Sapporo in their own half.
In the minute 32, Yoshiaki Komai for Sapporo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sapporo.
Takashi Usami (Gamba) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 33, Sapporo have a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Sapporo goal kick.
Free kick Gamba.
In the minute 37, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Sapporo in their own half.
Sapporo to take a throw-in in Gamba territory.
Sapporo have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
In the minute 41, Sapporo's Ryosuke Shindo attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Gamba at Sapporo.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a Gamba throw-in in Sapporo's half.
In the minute 43, Gamba have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
Gamba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Gamba close to the penalty box.
In the minute 44, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Gamba.
Sapporo's Yoshiaki Komai gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Gamba defender.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Gamba in their own half.
In the minute 45, Hiroyuki Kimura will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Sapporo to take a throw-in in Gamba territory.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Throw-in for Sapporo in the half of Gamba.
Gamba awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 48, Corner awarded to Gamba.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards the home team a throw-in.
Sapporo are pushing forward but Daiki Suga's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 50, Hiroyuki Kimura awards Gamba a goal kick.
Free kick for Gamba in their own half.
Can Sapporo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gamba's half?
In the minute 51, Free kick for Gamba in their own half.
Yoshiaki Komai gets his shot on target but fails to score for Sapporo.
In Sapporo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 55, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Sapporo in their own half.
Corner awarded to Gamba.
Sapporo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 58, Akito Fukumori (Sapporo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in Gamba.
Throw-in for Gamba at Sapporo.
In the minute 60, Hiroyuki Kimura awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Gamba's Shu Kurata gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 62, Goal kick for Sapporo at Sapporo.
Throw-in Sapporo.
Sapporo make their first substitution with Anderson Lopes replacing Yoshiaki Komai.
In the minute 64, Michael Petrovic is making the team's second substitution at Sapporo with Hiroki Miyazawa replacing Tomoki Takamine.
Michael Petrovic (Sapporo) is making a third substitution, with Douglas replacing Jay Bothroyd.
Patric is replacing Ademilson for Gamba at Sapporo.
In the minute 66, Gamba push upfield but Hiroyuki Kimura quickly pulls them for offside.
Sapporo have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Gamba in their own half.
In the minute 69, Gamba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Hiroyuki Kimura waits before resuming play because Genta Miura for Gamba is still down.
Sapporo push forward at Sapporo and Lucas Fernandes gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Gamba defence.
In the minute 74, Tsuneyasu Miyamoto (Gamba) is making a second change, with Gen Shoji replacing the possibly injured Genta Miura.
Yasuhito Endo is on a sub for Yuki Yamamoto for Gamba.
Kazuma Watanabe is replacing Takashi Usami for the away team.
In the minute 75, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Gamba to take a throw-in in Sapporo territory.
Sapporo have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
In the minute 78, Kazuma Watanabe scores to make it 0-1 at Sapporo.
Sapporo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Gamba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 81, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a Sapporo throw-in in Gamba's half.
Sapporo have a goal kick.
The home team have replaced Daiki Suga with Kosuke Shirai. This is the fourth substitution made today by Michael Petrovic.
In the minute 83, Anderson Lopes (Sapporo) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Gamba goal kick.
Can Sapporo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gamba's half?
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Gamba in their own half.
The away team replace Shu Kurata with Yuya Fukuda.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick Gamba.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Sapporo in their own half.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards the home team a throw-in.
In Sapporo, Ryosuke Shindo of Sapporo is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Throw-in for Sapporo in the half of Gamba.
Gamba needs to be cautious. Sapporo have an attacking throw-in.
That's full-time at Sapporo. The final score is 0-1.
